delegates.description: Delegate chain of approvals needed to perform full impersonation. Specify the fully qualified service account name.  Used only when using impersonation mode.

id_token.description: The `id_token` representing the new generated identity.

include_email.description: Include the verified email in the claim. Used only when using impersonation mode.

target_service_account.description: The email of the service account being impersonated.  Used only when using impersonation mode.
